website_summaries.verdict: The Supra Method, a sneaker of choice of mostly skaters, is splashed with dozens of attractive colorways. The cut-away segment around the collar is supported by a stretchy and spongy neoprene which doubles as insulation.It’s the same material that makes up the protruded tongue and the covering across the midfoot for a cozier feeling on the instep. The Achilles area is kept secured as the raised heel works as a supportive buttress, while the cushioning inside cradles the feet from impact.
pros: The Supra Method allows for effortless on and off, according to many
Supra does not scrimp on materials in constructing this well-assembled sneaker, as detailed by many buyers
The cushy upper offers comfort to the arched part on top of the foot, mentioned by users
This cushioning in this shoe is liberally distributed offering a fantastic comfort, as noted by lots of reviewers
The removable insole works like a mattress under the feet, as stated by a reviewer
The cushioned neoprene works as added support on the Achilles heel cited by a couple of users
In spite of its full-bodied frame, the Supra Method is lightweight, as stated by several reviewers
The mid-top cleatie concept of the Method shoe looks even more charming with jeans, mentioned by some users
Its rubber sole has tons of flexibility and shock absorbency, noted by a couple of skaters
According to a couple of reviewers, its flex grooves allows users to have control on their boards
cons: Some reviewers feel that the heel area is a bit wide
The actual colors are not the same as shown on the screen, according to a few commenters

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes and fit. Did a lot of research and ended up with these to cruise around in and mountain bike and these work great and turn a lot of heads as not people have this design and color combo. Never been disappointed with a Supra pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not REAL Teal.  Don't order 1/2 size up.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 1/2 size bigger as people suggested but its too big. Also, the teal is NOT teal. Its more of a green. The picture above makes it appear to be like a San Jose Sharks Teal (Pacific Teal). That's why I wanted them. They actually feel pretty good. May try a size 9 in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Jasshole

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: Quality shoes. I mainly purchased because I liked the color. They fit, as expected. Also this item arrived 2 days earlier then expected. Awesome sauce!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Order the size you would normally wear :)
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a costume party coming up and I wear a size 9 in Nike so I ordered a size 9 in these. Perfect fit, not really a person to wear high tops, but I may have to start as they are also quite comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: schandler rogers

customer_reviews.title: I love Supras. Only problem was I had to order ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Supras. Only problem was I had to order a 13 instead of a 12 and suck up the $15 size difference, but fantastic shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Maki

customer_reviews.title: Insanely comfortable and clean shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfect and look better than expected. I absolutely will be buying a different color or style real soon.
customer_reviews.author: Dgsumms

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: My foot slips in like ace ventura parking a car. These are just as good looking as advertised. Material is a bit cheap, but at least it's cooler than a pimp in Alaska
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Pieplow

customer_reviews.title: Supra shoe review
customer_reviews.text: Great service, received the correct shoe, size and colour...and it arrived very quickly. Greatly appreciated. Cheers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Probably my favorite pair of shoes I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Probably my favorite pair of shoes I've ever owned. Lightweight feel, sleek look, comfortable! Great price too. Runs a half size large in my opinion but I honestly love them too much to swap out for the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: SUPRAS!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a little late but the shoes came pretty fast. There weren’t any design flaws and looks very pleasing to me. I love these shoes so much and I’ve always wanted a pair of supras. Haven’t worn them yet but really glad they’re apart of my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Loc Ta

customer_reviews.title: Very good deal
customer_reviews.text: The best brand and the best deal , as expected condition , good seller
customer_reviews.author: Juan Cevallos

customer_reviews.title: Devolución pendiente
customer_reviews.text: horrible service, it is not fair that you will pay 24 dollars for a defective product
customer_reviews.author: Janette

customer_reviews.title: Over a week and a half late.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the brand and the coming combination of colors but they are over a week and a half late.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Herring III

customer_reviews.title: Up-Size 0.5!
customer_reviews.text: Some supra shoes run a bit small. I recomend getting a half size larger for a nice fit. I wear a size 9, and my foot is a bit wider; but a 9.5 fits perfect. The shoe also looks great for casual wear. The comfort is standard, if you are looking for super cushion i reccomend getting an insole you like and replace the supplied one.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Fit wasn't right for me and size wasn't the issue!
customer_reviews.text: Sneaker looked great out the box, if you can get over the feeling of your heel feeling like it is going to slip out the shoe then maybe they will be okay!, but i had to return...
customer_reviews.author: Booqs

product_meta.title: Supra Men's Method Low-Top Sneakers
product_meta.description: If you like sporty and urban fashion, here's a great pair of trainers for you from Supra! With a Leather and synthetic upper and nice black colour, they are as comfortable as they are stylish. The Method has a fabric lining and a rubber outer sole. A must-have shoe for the season.
